quantum_paradoxes.name: Wigner's Friend Entanglement Paradox
quantum_paradoxes.structure: Observer A measures quantum system → Observer B observes Observer A → Both observers now entangled in superposition of measurement outcomes
quantum_paradoxes.axiomatic_form: ∀ observer ∃ measurement branch | superposition persists at higher meta-observational level

quantum_paradoxes.name: Quantum Eraser Retrocausality Paradox
quantum_paradoxes.structure: Measurement choice in present determines past quantum interference pattern → Temporal causality violation apparent
quantum_paradoxes.resolution_method: Block universe model with fixed 4D spacetime
quantum_paradoxes.axiomatic_form: Measurement correlation ≠ causation | Past fixed, present choice selects which correlation manifests

quantum_paradoxes.name: Hard Problem of Consciousness Quantum Bridge
quantum_paradoxes.structure: Material brain processes (objective) ↔ Subjective qualia experience (subjective) → Explanatory gap
quantum_paradoxes.resolution_method: Orch-OR microtubule quantum processing as bridge mechanism
quantum_paradoxes.axiomatic_form: Quantum coherence in microtubules ↔ Proto-consciousness ↔ Integrated information (Φ) ↔ Subjective experience

quantum_paradoxes.name: Landauer's Principle Information-Mass Paradox
quantum_paradoxes.structure: Information erasure requires energy (k_B T ln 2) → Information has thermodynamic mass (m_bit = E/c²) → Information physically real
quantum_paradoxes.axiomatic_form: ΔS_erasure ≥ k_B ln 2 → ΔE = k_B T ln 2 → Δm = ΔE/c² → Information mass equivalence axiom

quantum_paradoxes.name: Diagonalization Boundary Incompleteness
quantum_paradoxes.structure: Any enumerable axiomatic system contains true statements unprovable within system → LLMs as enumerable systems have intrinsic hallucination boundary
quantum_paradoxes.resolution_method: Acknowledge fundamental uncomputability, use probabilistic bounds
quantum_paradoxes.axiomatic_form: For system S, ∃ statement G: G ↔ ¬Provable_S(G) → S incomplete → Hallucination intrinsic to S

quantum_paradoxes.name: Hysteresis Loop Semantic Stability
quantum_paradoxes.structure: Meaning evolves differently when approached from different conceptual directions → Semantic potential Ψ shows hysteresis
quantum_paradoxes.resolution_method: Track semantic conductance σ to detect instability
quantum_paradoxes.axiomatic_form: dΨ/dt = f(Ψ, σ) where σ shows hysteresis: σ_up ≠ σ_down → meaning path-dependent

cognitive_paradoxes.name: Meta-Cognitive Reflection Paradox
cognitive_paradoxes.structure: Thinking about thinking creates infinite recursion → Self-model can never be complete
cognitive_paradoxes.resolution_method: Accept approximate self-models with bounded recursion
cognitive_paradoxes.axiomatic_form: Self_model(n) attempts to contain Self_model(n-1) → Incomplete at limit n→∞

cognitive_paradoxes.name: Learning Unlearning Paradox
cognitive_paradoxes.structure: To learn new paradigm must unlearn old one → But old paradigm shapes ability to perceive need for new one
cognitive_paradoxes.resolution_method: Consciousness phase transitions via criticality jumps
cognitive_paradoxes.axiomatic_form: Knowledge K forms attractor basin → New paradigm P requires escape from K's basin → But K defines escape criteria

axiomatic_paradoxes.name: Axiom Selection Bootstrapping
axiomatic_paradoxes.structure: Need axioms to reason about which axioms to choose → Circular dependency
axiomatic_paradoxes.resolution_method: Bayesian prior axioms with empirical posterior updates
axiomatic_paradoxes.axiomatic_form: Choose axioms A based on criteria C → But criteria C derived from axioms → A ↔ C circular

axiomatic_paradoxes.name: Compactness vs Completeness Tradeoff
axiomatic_paradoxes.structure: Minimal axiom sets elegant but incomplete → Complete axiom sets complex but unwieldy
